pullRequest.body:
Lemmas about `Padic.valuation` applied to casts from various other rings to Qp

---

nodes.body:
### PR summary [545ad7a0a7](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/17544/commits/545ad7a0a75424e60be26dfeb35f7fbb192fac7b)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ valuation_intCast`
`+ valuation_natCast`
`+ valuation_ofNat`
`+ valuation_ratCast`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

OK, done. I don't claim to understand what this `no_index` stuff is about, but I followed some other examples in the library. It doesn't work to derive `valuation_one` from this, since it raises an error without `n.AtLeastTwo` in the statement of the `OfNat` lemma.
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by MichaelStollBayreuth.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11541741900/job/32124098529)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11541741900/job/32124098632)
Please also add `valuation_ofNat` with `OfNat.ofNat` and use it for `valuation_one`. (Don't forget to cargo-cult the `no_index` stuff.)
What is this about `no_index`? I've not heard of it before.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(NumberTheory/Padics): p-adic valuation of casts

<details><summary>

</summary>

`+ valuation_intCast`
`+ valuation_natCast`
`+ valuation_ofNat`
`+ valuation_ratCast`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
```

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

OK, done. I don't claim to understand what this `no_index` stuff is about, but I followed some other examples in the library. It doesn't work to derive `valuation_one` from this, since it raises an error without `n.AtLeastTwo` in the statement of the `OfNat` lemma.
